text: How do I checkin the code of email template which is custom coded in bit bucket?
Hey, sorry, missed your message. It was after setting up a new boilerplate site on a new account. If you don’t have any website pages and try to preview the theme, it shows a “test mode” tag.
So to confirm, you saw this tag when previewing the theme through the design manager correct?
Hi there Andrey. We’re still getting this into the documentation but here’s an explainer on it. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/design-manager/theme-test-mode>
